13:18 <DarkKnightCZ> How can i lookup all components implementing certain role?  
13:18 <vmassol> cm.getInstanceList(role)  
13:18 <vmassol> or @Inject List<role>  
13:19 <vmassol> (DarkKnightCZ)  
13:19 <vmassol> or @Inject Provider<List<role>> to do it dynamically  
13:21 <DarkKnightCZ> great, thanks

20:47 <mbloom> hey I’m trying to set the parent of a page using the API but it doesnt seem to be working in 6.1 I have 3 lines of code for a page:
